org.letras.ps.rawdata
Class PenDriverManager

java.lang.Object
  org.letras.ps.rawdata.PenDriverManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.mundo.util.plugins.IPluginMonitor.IPluginHandler
public class PenDriverManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.mundo.util.plugins.IPluginMonitor.IPluginHandler

The pen driver manager is used to monitor and control the currently installed drivers. By using this class, a driver can be installed by simply putting into the appropriate driver directory. Internally this class uses the Mundo plugin mechanism by defining a custom plugin handler.

Pen drivers can be loaded and installed only once. Trying to load the same pen driver a second time simply will be ignored unless the first driver has been unloaded.

Version:
0.0.1
Author:
felix_h

Method Detail

getDrivers

public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,IPenDriver> getDrivers()

setDrivers

public void setDrivers(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,IPenDriver> drivers)

loadDriver

public void loadDriver(IPenDriver driver)
Used to load a new driver into the active drivers. This will call the driver's init() method and add the driver to the list of currently active drivers in the system. Normally this method will be called automatically by the PenDriverManager whenever a new driver was discovered and pre-configured.

It is however possible to load drivers explicitly via a call to this method. Test scenarios for example will rely on this feature.

Parameters:
driver - the driver to load

unloadDriver

public void unloadDriver(IPenDriver driver)
Used to unload a driver from the active drivers. This will call the driver's shutdown() method and remove the driver from the list of currently active drivers in the system. Normally this method will be called automatically by the PenDriverManager whenever a driver was removed.

It is however possible to unload drivers explicitly via a call to this method. Test scenarios for example will rely on this feature.

Parameters:
driver - the driver to unload

isLoaded

public boolean isLoaded(IPenDriver driver)
Checks whether a driver is already loaded. Returns true only if this specific driver instance is loaded.

Parameters:
driver - the driver to check
Returns:
true if the driver is loaded, falls otherwise

init

public void init()
Used to initialize the pen driver manager. Called after creation, to allow the PenDriverManager to get ready for usage.

shutdown

public void shutdown()
Used to shutdown the PenDriverManager. Shuts down all currently registered drivers.
